ConversationMessageDefinition.label: I want to register my business with Ndax

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
1. To open a Business Account on Ndax, please follow these steps:
    • Request and complete the Ndax Business Account Application Form (available from our Support Team).
    • Submit documents that verify your business’s existence (e.g., Business Registration, Certificate of Incorporation).

  2. Additional documents—such as a corporate resolution or ID verification for shareholders—may be required depending on the information provided. We'll guide you through the next steps once we review your submission.
